title: The Chalet
description: Four friends. One luxury getaway. The perfect murder.French Alps, 1998Two young men ski into a blizzardâ€¦ but only one returns.20 years laterFour people connected to the missing man find themselves in that same resort. Each has a secret. Two may have blood on their hands. One is a killer-in-waiting.Someone knows what really happened that day.And somebody will pay.
author: Catherine    Cooper
